import React, {useEffect, useSelector} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {setName, setRoom} from '../../actions/joinRoomActions' export const JoinRoom = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleNameChange = (e) => { console.log(e.target) debugger dispatch(setName(e.target.name.value)) } const handleRoomChange = (e) => { dispatch(setRoom(e.target.room_id.value)) } return (

The user will enter a nickname and a room number.

"Click Here To Join"

handleNameChange(e)}/> handleRoomChange(e)}/>
) } export default JoinRoom
